entity.name: The White House

text:
@WhiteHouse NO! I want to feel safe that I won’t die leaving my neighborhood by an invisible enemy that you think is a “mirage”. 
MONEY CANNOT BUY LIFE! #MyLifeMatters #COVID19 #FridayFeeling #TrumpVirus #Resist #Resisters #MAGA #KAGA2020 #MAGA2020
